tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE sampling_techniques_for_ml (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    feature_1 FLOAT,
    feature_2 FLOAT,
    feature_3 FLOAT
)

CREATE TABLE SampledData (
    data_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    technique_id INT,
    data_value FLOAT,
    label VARCHAR(50),
    FOREIGN KEY (technique_id) REFERENCES SamplingTechniques(technique_id)
);

CREATE TABLE sampled_data (
    data_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    sample_name VARCHAR(50),
    sample_size INT,
    sampling_method VARCHAR(50),
    data_table VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE balanced_datasets (
    dataset_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    dataset_name VARCHAR(50),
    dataset_size INT,
    dataset_type VARCHAR(50),
    target_variable VARCHAR(50)
);
